text: The Portuguese Republican Party was a Portuguese political party formed during the late years of Kingdom of Portugal. The party was an important part of the Portuguese First Republic.O Campo Político dos Partidos Republicanos Portugueses (1910-1926), por Ernesto Castro Leal, Lagos da República When the Republic was established on the 5 October 1910 Revolution, the members of the party soon began splitting into different parties. ==References== Category:Political parties in Portugal Category:1878 establishments in Europe Category:1912 disestablishments
title: Portuguese Republican Party
